A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was \"Meh\" at best. Slightly better than Phantom Menace (also 2 stars). The entire Casino scene was terribly slow and unnecessary. The only redeeming portion of the film was the bombing run space battle and the fight in Smokes throne room. The rest could have been scrapped. Should have borrowed more from the now non-canon \"Legends\" books.
